Libraries¶

Participant Library¶

Behaviors Behaviors library contains a set of common models of behavior.

Current functions in the behavior library:

Behaviors.RandomAgent() Create a function that returns floats between 0 and 1.
Behaviors.BernoulliAgent([Bias]) Create a function that returns 1 with a certain probability and 0 otherwise.
Behaviors.BinomialAgent(N, Bias) Create a function that returns the sum of n independent bernoulli samples
Behaviors.PoissonAgent([L]) Create a function that returns a sample from a poisson distribution.
Behaviors.EmpiricalAgent(List) Create a function defined from an empirical sample.
Behaviors.GeometricAgent(param) Create a function that returns a sample from a geometric distribution.

Test Library¶

Tests Tests library contains a set of common statistical procedures.

Current function in the test library:

Tests.BinomialTest([TestType, alpha, Bias]) Create a binomial test.
Tests.MajorityTest() Create a qualitative majority test.
Tests.TTest([alpha]) Create a T-Test
Tests.FisherExactTest([alpha]) Create a Fisher exact test.
Tests.MeanDifferenceTest([BootSamples, ...]) Create a function that bootstraps the difference in the means of two conditions.
Tests.BinomialWithControlTest([TestType, ...]) Create a function that runs a binomial test on two conditions.
